eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.citizens

Class WauzCitizen

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.mobs.citizens.WauzCitizen

  • public class WauzCitizen
extends java.lang.Object
    A citizen, generated from a citizen config file.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzCitizenSpawner
